resources.string: Note: In order to register as a management account, you need to provide your legit IC number and phone number.
- Verified badge will be appeared next to the username once you have provided your NRIC and phone number. - Go to "Me" > "My Profile" , and update your NRIC and phone number
- This is the indicator of your complaints\' total Upvote counts.
- This is the indicator of your complaints\' total Downvote counts.
- This is where all the complaints registered by you will be grouped.
- When the management has solved your complaint, the particular complaints will be grouped here.
- Admin can remove your complaints for any reason and they will be grouped here.
- This is where all the complaints handled by you will be grouped.
- This is where all the complaints solved by you will be grouped.
<<< Swipe left to delete the notification.
